constituent: scold, mouth, diced, seven, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisigStory: Recall some particularly harsh scolding you got as a child in school. This character has you sitting on the ground in the corner as your teacher stands over you, her mouth wide open as she reprimands you in front of the entire class.
koohiiStory1: A kid gets scolded if they don´t put the spoon properly into their mouth when eating.
koohiiStory2: If I got scolded, I could expect a spoon of castor oil in my mouth.
myStory: quát mắng. nói mắng với cái thìa. thìa cho vào miệng bị mắng
